ui

Class PharmacistUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • ui.PharmacistUI

  • public class PharmacistUI
extends java.lang.Object
    The PharmacistUI class provides a menu-driven interface for pharmacists within the hospital management system. It allows pharmacists to manage prescriptions, view appointment outcomes, monitor medication inventory, and submit replenishment requests.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PharmacistUI(Pharmacist pharmacist)
      Constructs a PharmacistUI instance for the specified pharmacist.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void displayMenu()
      Displays the main menu for the pharmacist and provides options for various tasks, including: Viewing appointment outcome records Updating prescription statuses Viewing medication inventory Submitting replenishment requests Changing password Logging out This method runs in a loop until the pharmacist selects the logout option.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • PharmacistUI

        public PharmacistUI(Pharmacist pharmacist)
        Constructs a PharmacistUI instance for the specified pharmacist.
        Parameters:
        pharmacist - The Pharmacist object representing the logged-in pharmacist.

    • Method Detail

      • displayMenu

        public void displayMenu()
        Displays the main menu for the pharmacist and provides options for various tasks, including:
        • Viewing appointment outcome records
        • Updating prescription statuses
        • Viewing medication inventory
        • Submitting replenishment requests
        • Changing password
        • Logging out
        This method runs in a loop until the pharmacist selects the logout option.
